f*&k(*& Leechers

Stop complaining about not getting any speed. Do you people understand the basic way torrenting even works?

Footy is not one of the major torrent sharers like EZTV etcetera with unbelievable uploading speed. He has limited bandwidth (internet speed) like the rest of us have. 

When he uploads these torrents it takes him a while to distribute the file completely to enough people to create Seeds who can then share the file. After that it spreads faster and faster.

Why are you all even complaining about Leechers too? You are leechers right now.  Leechers are the F1 fans trying to get the torrent right now. Exactly like you are!

Want to know what the problem is?

Footy has limited speed and will take long to spread the file to about 500 people who can then spread it faster after becoming seeds. At this time there are only 200 people with the complete file while 4100 people are trying to download it. See how that creates a problem? 

Just shut up and provide full bandwidth to the upload side of your torrent. No one will get max speed unless enough seeds are created. You will get maximum speed though at certain parts of the file which have been downloaded by fellow leechers. 

Also only a couple of people will connect to seeds because 200 people have the complete file (seeds) while +4,000 are trying to download off them. Most of you cant connect to them.

There is nothing wrong with this torrent. The only problem is that this is currently the most downloaded Torrent in T.V show category of TPB. There is nothing you can do and seeds cant just magically appear. Stop whining because it wont do one thing. Those who will seed the torrent cant seed unless they get the file, those who wont don't give a rats ass even if you beg to them.
